Mission & Vision

Driven by Purpose, Powered by Innovation.

Mission

|


"R&R is committed to guiding eligible students in securing admission to top overseas colleges and universities for their chosen courses and programs. We ensure a seamless and hassle-free travel experience for successful applicants, enabling them to embark on their academic journeys with confidence, legitimacy, and security."

Vision

|


"By 2025, R&R aspires to be the foremost educational consultancy in every major city in the Philippines, distinguished by our high-quality, complimentary consulting services. We aim to continually expand our offerings to support a growing number of offshore students, solidifying our reputation as industry leaders with legitimacy and security at the forefront of our operations."

Why Choose Us?

At RnR AU, we don’t just help you study in Australia—we provide multiple pathways to achieve your career goals, including Visa Sponsorship and Skilled Migration Visa options.

What Make Us Different?

FREE Consultation

Get started with a no-obligation consultation where we assess your goals, qualifications, and opportunities for studying and working in Australia. We’ll provide expert advice on the best pathways available for you.

Eligibility Assessment

We evaluate your academic background, work experience, and qualifications to determine your eligibility for Australian universities, employment contracts, and visa sponsorship programs. This ensures you apply for programs that best fit your profile.

University & Career Pathway Assistance

We connect you with top Australian universities that offer courses aligned with your career goals. Additionally, we help explore employment opportunities with visa sponsorship options, allowing you to study and work in Australia seamlessly.

Enrollment & Application Guidance

We simplify the enrollment process by guiding you through university applications, ensuring all requirements are met. From filling out forms to submitting necessary documents, we provide step-by-step assistance to make the process smooth and stress-free.

Application & Visa Processing

Our team assists in preparing and submitting all necessary documents for your university application and visa processing. We ensure accuracy and compliance with immigration requirements to increase the chances of approval.

Interview Preparation

Whether it’s a university admissions interview or a visa interview, we provide expert coaching to help you prepare with confidence. We cover common questions, interview techniques, and tips to improve your chances of success.

Program we offer:

CHC33021 - Certificate III in Individual Support (Ageing & Disability)

"R&R Au Educational Consultancy Services, in partnership with GeSS Education, proudly introduces the first and only University Pathway in the Philippines offering in-country offshore training aligned with the Australian Qualifications Framework (AQF). Our comprehensive 6-month Aged Care training program includes an employment contract and Visa sponsorship (407/482) through our secure partner, an esteemed Australian aged care employment institution."

Read more

SIT30622 - Certificate III in Hospitality

 is a nationally recognized qualification in Australia designed for individuals who want to develop the essential skills needed to work in the hospitality industry. This course provides hands-on training and theoretical knowledge to prepare students for roles in hotels, restaurants, cafés, bars, and other hospitality establishments.

Read more
